ChatGPT said:

Here's your updated storage.js fully aligned with your current functionality, including:

  • Upload image under customizable key (default "profilePicture")

  • Delete image from Storage by key

  • Get image download URL by key

  • A helper saveProfilePhotoAndUpdateDB that uploads image and updates Firestore user profile document accordingly

  • Validation logic intact

js
// src/services/storage.js
import { getStorage, ref, uploadBytesResumable, getDownloadURL, deleteObject } from "firebase/storage";
import { app } from "./firebase"; // uses the same firebase app instance
import { updateUserProfile } from "./db"; // Firestore update helper

// Config
export const VALID_IMAGE_TYPES = ["image/jpeg", "image/png", "image/gif", "image/webp"];
export const IMAGE_MAX_SIZE = 2 * 1024 * 1024; // 2 MB

const storage = getStorage(app);

/**
 * Validate an image file (type + size).
 * @param {File} file
 * @param {number} maxSize
 * @returns {boolean}
 */
export function validateImageFile(file, maxSize = IMAGE_MAX_SIZE) {
  if (!file) return false;
  if (!VALID_IMAGE_TYPES.includes(file.type)) return false;
  if (file.size > maxSize) return false;
  return true;
}

/**
 * Upload a user image to Storage and return the download URL.
 *
 * @param {string} uid - user id
 * @param {File} file - File object from input
 * @param {string} imageKey - storage filename/key (default: "profilePicture")
 * @param {(progress:number, snapshot?:object)=>void} onProgress - optional progress callback (0-100)
 * @returns {Promise<string>} download URL
 */
export async function uploadUserImage(uid, file, imageKey = "profilePicture", onProgress) {
  if (!uid) throw new Error("UID is required");
  if (!file) throw new Error("File is required");

  if (!validateImageFile(file)) {
    throw new Error("Invalid file: only jpeg/png/gif/webp under 2MB allowed");
  }

  const storageRef = ref(storage, `users/${uid}/${imageKey}`);
  const metadata = { contentType: file.type };

  const uploadTask = uploadBytesResumable(storageRef, file, metadata);

  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    uploadTask.on(
      "state_changed",
      (snapshot) => {
        const progress = (snapshot.bytesTransferred / snapshot.totalBytes) * 100;
        if (typeof onProgress === "function") onProgress(Math.round(progress), snapshot);
      },
      (error) => reject(error),
      async () => {
        try {
          const url = await getDownloadURL(uploadTask.snapshot.ref);
          resolve(url);
        } catch (err) {
          reject(err);
        }
      }
    );
  });
}

/**
 * Delete a user's image from Storage.
 * @param {string} uid
 * @param {string} imageKey - storage filename/key (default: "profilePicture")
 * @returns {Promise<void>}
 */
export async function deleteUserImage(uid, imageKey = "profilePicture") {
  if (!uid) throw new Error("UID is required");
  const storageRef = ref(storage, `users/${uid}/${imageKey}`);
  await deleteObject(storageRef);
}

/**
 * Get download URL for an existing user image.
 * @param {string} uid
 * @param {string} imageKey - storage filename/key (default: "profilePicture")
 * @returns {Promise<string>} download URL
 */
export async function getUserImageUrl(uid, imageKey = "profilePicture") {
  if (!uid) throw new Error("UID is required");
  const storageRef = ref(storage, `users/${uid}/${imageKey}`);
  return await getDownloadURL(storageRef);
}

/**
 * Upload user profile photo and update Firestore user profile.
 * @param {string} uid
 * @param {File} file
 * @param {string} imageKey - storage filename/key (default: "profilePicture")
 * @returns {Promise<string>} download URL
 */
export async function saveProfilePhotoAndUpdateDB(uid, file, imageKey = "profilePicture") {
  if (!uid) throw new Error("UID is required");
  if (!file) throw new Error("File is required");

  // Upload image to Storage
  const imageUrl = await uploadUserImage(uid, file, imageKey);

  // Update Firestore profile document with new image URL
  const updateData = {};
  updateData[imageKey] = imageUrl;
  await updateUserProfile(uid, updateData);

  return imageUrl;
}

Notes:

  • saveProfilePhotoAndUpdateDB now supports arbitrary imageKey (e.g. "profilePicture" or "coverPhoto") and updates Firestore accordingly.

  • All validation and error handling are preserved.

  • This structure fits your modular, reusable design perfectly.

Got it! I’ll create a standalone reusable ProfileImage React component that handles:

  • Displaying user profile image or initials fallback

  • Uploading new profile image with validation and progress

  • Removing profile image

  • Updating the user profile image URL in Firestore

  • Showing error and success messages

It’ll accept props like uid (user id) and optionally callbacks, and internally use your existing storage.js methods.

Here’s the full ProfileImage.jsx component:

jsx
// src/components/Profile/ProfileImage.jsx
import React, { useState, useRef } from "react";
import PropTypes from "prop-types";
import { uploadUserImage, deleteUserImage } from "../../services/storage";
import { updateUserProfile } from "../../services/db";
import "../../styles/Profile/ProfileOverview.css";

const MAX_IMAGE_SIZE_BYTES = 2 * 1024 * 1024; // 2MB
const ALLOWED_IMAGE_TYPES = ["image/jpeg", "image/png", "image/gif", "image/webp"];

export default function ProfileImage({ uid, initialImageUrl, onChange }) {
  const [imageUrl, setImageUrl] = useState(initialImageUrl || "");
  const [errorMessage, setErrorMessage] = useState("");
  const [successMessage, setSuccessMessage] = useState("");
  const [uploading, setUploading] = useState(false);
  const fileInputRef = useRef(null);

  // Generate initials from UID or fallback string
  const getInitials = () => {
    if (!uid) return "U";
    const parts = uid.split(/[\s@.]+/);
    if (parts.length === 1) return parts[0][0].toUpperCase();
    return (parts[0][0] + parts[1][0]).toUpperCase();
  };

  const getRandomPastelColor = (seed) => {
    let hash = 0;
    for (let i = 0; i < seed.length; i++) {
      hash = seed.charCodeAt(i) + ((hash << 5) - hash);
    }
    const h = hash % 360;
    return `hsl(${h}, 70%, 80%)`;
  };

  // Validation
  const validateFile = (file) => {
    if (!file) return "No file selected.";
    if (!ALLOWED_IMAGE_TYPES.includes(file.type)) return "Invalid file type. Only JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP allowed.";
    if (file.size > MAX_IMAGE_SIZE_BYTES) return "File too large. Max size is 2MB.";
    return null;
  };

  // Handle image file selection & upload
  const handleFileChange = async (e) => {
    setErrorMessage("");
    setSuccessMessage("");
    const file = e.target.files[0];
    const error = validateFile(file);
    if (error) {
      setErrorMessage(error);
      e.target.value = null;
      return;
    }
    if (!uid) {
      setErrorMessage("User ID not available.");
      return;
    }

    setUploading(true);
    try {
      // Upload image to Firebase Storage
      const url = await uploadUserImage(uid, file, "profilePicture", (progress) => {
        // Could add progress bar here if desired
        // console.log("Upload progress:", progress);
      });

      // Update Firestore user profile with new URL
      await updateUserProfile(uid, { profilePicture: url });

      setImageUrl(url);
      setSuccessMessage("Profile image updated successfully!");
      if (typeof onChange === "function") onChange(url);
    } catch (err) {
      console.error("Upload failed:", err);
      setErrorMessage("Failed to upload image. Try again.");
    } finally {
      setUploading(false);
      e.target.value = null;
    }
  };

  // Handle removing current image
  const handleRemoveImage = async () => {
    setErrorMessage("");
    setSuccessMessage("");
    if (!uid) {
      setErrorMessage("User ID not available.");
      return;
    }
    try {
      await deleteUserImage(uid, "profilePicture");
      await updateUserProfile(uid, { profilePicture: "" });
      setImageUrl("");
      setSuccessMessage("Profile image removed.");
      if (typeof onChange === "function") onChange("");
    } catch (err) {
      console.error("Remove image failed:", err);
      setErrorMessage("Failed to remove image. Try again.");
    }
  };

  const initialsBgColor = getRandomPastelColor(uid || "U");

  return (
    <div className="profile-images" style={{ flexDirection: "row", alignItems: "center", gap: "1rem" }}>
      {imageUrl ? (
        <img
          src={imageUrl}
          alt="Profile avatar"
          className="profile-avatar"
          loading="lazy"
          style={{ flexShrink: 0 }}
        />
      ) : (
        <div
          className="initials-avatar"
          aria-label="User initials avatar"
          style={{ backgroundColor: initialsBgColor, flexShrink: 0 }}
        >
          {getInitials()}
        </div>
      )}

      <div style={{ display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", gap: "0.5rem" }}>
        <input
          type="file"
          accept="image/*"
          onChange={handleFileChange}
          ref={fileInputRef}
          style={{ display: "none" }}
          id="profile-image-upload"
        />
        <label
          htmlFor="profile-image-upload"
          className="icon-button edit-button"
          tabIndex={0}
          aria-label="Upload new profile image"
          style={{ width: 36, height: 36, fontSize: "1.3rem" }}
        >
          &#9998;
        </label>

        {imageUrl && (
          <button
            type="button"
            onClick={handleRemoveImage}
            className="icon-button remove-button"
            aria-label="Remove profile image"
            style={{ width: 36, height: 36, fontSize: "1.5rem" }}
          >
            &times;
          </button>
        )}
      </div>

      {(errorMessage || successMessage) && (
        <div style={{ marginLeft: "1rem", fontSize: "0.9rem", minWidth: "200px" }}>
          {errorMessage && <p style={{ color: "red" }} role="alert">{errorMessage}</p>}
          {successMessage && <p style={{ color: "green" }} role="status">{successMessage}</p>}
        </div>
      )}

      {uploading && <p style={{ marginLeft: "1rem" }}>Uploading...</p>}
    </div>
  );
}

ProfileImage.propTypes = {
  uid: PropTypes.string.isRequired,
  initialImageUrl: PropTypes.string,
  onChange: PropTypes.func,
};

How to use this component in your ProfileOverview.jsx:

  1. Import the new component:

jsx
import ProfileImage from "./ProfileImage";

  1. Replace the existing image + icons block with:

jsx
<ProfileImage
  uid={user?.uid}
  initialImageUrl={profileData.profileImageUrl}
  onChange={(newUrl) => setProfileData((prev) => ({ ...prev, profileImageUrl: newUrl }))}
/>

This keeps the parent ProfileOverview state in sync with image changes.

What this does:

  • Handles file selection, upload with progress, and removal visually in one place

  • Updates Firestore profilePicture field automatically on upload/remove

  • Shows user initials with a pastel background if no image present

  • Displays upload status and error/success messages next to the image

  • Uses your existing CSS classes for consistent styling with the rest of your profile page
